squidpony.squidgrid.gui.libgdx

Class SGPanelGDX

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.libgdx.SGPanelGDX
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, SGPane

    @Beta
public class SGPanelGDX
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
implements SGPane
    A libGDX implementation of SPanel that allows both text and graphics.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

              java.awt.Font font)
        Description copied from interface: SGPane
        Initializes the component with the supplied values. The cells will be set to the desired width and height and if the size of the font is too large, it will be shrunk until everything fits.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface SGPane
        Parameters:
        cellWidth - in pixels
        cellHeight - in pixels
        gridWidth - in cells
        gridHeight - in cells

      • placeCharacter

                  int y,
                  char c,
                  java.awt.Color fore,
                  java.awt.Color back)
        Description copied from interface: SGPane

        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to set
        y - The y coordinate to set
        c - The character to be displayed

        back - The background color

      • placeImage

        public void placeImage(int x,
              int y,
              java.lang.String key)
        Description copied from interface: SGPane
        Places the image associated with the provided key at the given coordinates. If the key does not have an associated image, the factory's default null image is used.
        Specified by:
        placeImage in interface SGPane

      • placeImage

        public void placeImage(int x,
              int y,
              java.lang.String key,
              java.awt.Color background)
        Description copied from interface: SGPane
        Places the image associated with the provided key at the given coordinates. If the key does not have an associated image, the factory's default null image is used. The background will be set to the provided Color, but will only show up if the keyed image has transparency.
        Specified by:
        placeImage in interface SGPane

      • placeText

        public void placeText(int xOffset,
             int yOffset,
             char[][] chars)
        Description copied from interface: SGPane
        Sets the contents of the component to reflect the two dimensional character array, starting at the given offset position. The default foreground color is used and the background is not effected. Any content that would be off the screen to the right or down is ignored.
        Specified by:
        placeText in interface SGPane

        public void setText(char[][] chars)
        Description copied from interface: SGPane
        Sets the contents of the component to reflect the two dimensional character array. Will ignore any portion of the array that is outside the bounds of the component itself. The default colors of the foreground and background will be used.

      • setMaxDisplaySize

        public void setMaxDisplaySize(int width,
                     int height)
        Description copied from interface: SGPane
        Sets the display to the given size. The same grid size is used, but the cell dimensions will be changed to fit the grid within the given parameters. Can be called on an active panel, causing the panel to resize. The input to the display must be provided again, all data regarding the output is removed.
        Specified by:
        setMaxDisplaySize in interface SGPane
